thread.title: Watch: Trump takes part in panel discussion with White House officials

title: Watch: Trump takes part in panel discussion with White House officials
text:
Watch: Trump takes part in panel discussion with White House officials 2 Hours Ago Breaking News 
[The stream is slated to start at 2:15 p.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.] 
President Donald Trump is scheduled to take part in the Generation Next Summit on Thursday. 
Trump will participate in a panel discussion at the summit alongside a bevy of administration officials, including Labor Secretary Alexander Acosta, Education Secretary Betsy DeVos , Chief of Staff John Kelly and presidential counselor Kellyanne Conway . The president's daughter, Ivanka Trump , also spoke at the summit. 
The summit panel comes shortly after Trump signed new tariffs against China on Thursday in retaliation for various trade practices that the administration says are unfair to the U.S. 
The panel will take place at the Eisenhower Executive Office Building in Washington. CNBC NEWSLETTERS
